original_title: Dreaming Walls: Inside the Chelsea Hotel
overview: The end of an eight-year upmarket renovation of the legendary Chelsea Hotel is partly longed for and partly dreaded by the artists who still live there. The film grants us access to their apartments and interweaves the past with the present.
tagline: A legendary New York Hotel seen through the eyes of those who never left.
title: Dreaming Walls: Inside the Chelsea Hotel
